{{Infobox dungeon |name = Mt Mortar |image = [[File:Mt Mortar.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Mt Mortar |tokens = 5,500 |location = On route 42, east of Ecruteak City }} '''Mt Mortar''' is a dungeon in [[Johto]].

{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Normal || 104,100 |- | Boss || 360,000 |}
===Pokémon===
